title: wine_Mullineux_2014_Syrah_(Swartland)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 51351.
country: South Africa.
description: This ripe selection conveys a superb sense of balance and refinement, with forward aromas and flavors of black cherry and brambly berry framed by notes of wood spice, mocha and pressed violet. Velvety in feel, the texture is plush and seductive, with fine yet structured tannins and ample acidity to keep the palate fresh through the close. It's certainly delicious now, but this should age well through 2022..
designation: .

province: Swartland.
